property.value: Time To Clear Up The PigDogs

property.name: description_key

property.name: offer_key
property.value: I want you to go out and find my Stoggy Stash. 50 Packs of the finest Cigars youve ever smoked. They were stolen by the BR1NXs Bandits. If you see them Fuck Them Up

property.name: offer_key
property.value: A shit load of Loot has gone. It was that Baddass Bandit Camoes and his thirsty crew. Steal back my Shit and sort them Fuckers out.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: PandaPants75s Builder pack has been stolen. Its upto You and only You to get this back so he can carry on his work. If you see the people responsable kill them all.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: A band of outlaws has taken Ipossoms special Pavlova Recipe. We Need That Back you hear. If you find the culprits mess them up so even their mothers cant recognise them.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Nauti Angel has done it again. Shes only gone and stolen our life times supply of Canned Pears. When you find her Stash Rip her a New one. She deserves NO Mercy.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Kain383 Has stolen Our Arms Supply. We want all our hardware back. Follow the Clues And bring back our Gear. If you see him End Him
